thread.title: 'Nervous' Melania Trump 'shudders' as husband Donald touches her on the arm during Florida speech
thread.title_full: 'Nervous' Melania Trump 'shudders' as husband Donald touches her on the arm during Florida speech

author: Kara O'Neill
title: 'Nervous' Melania Trump 'shudders' as husband Donald touches her on the arm during Florida speech
text:
'Nervous' Melania Trump 'shudders' as husband Donald touches her on the arm during Florida speech The First Lady has been captured on camera several times looking unhappy as she accompanies her husband Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Melania and Donald Trump's awkward body language continues Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
This footage appears to show Melania Trump 'shuddering' as Donald Trump touches her arm mid-speech. 
The First Lady was accompanying her husband at a campaign rally at the Orlando-Melbourne International airport in Florida. 
Melania, 46, began her speech with a prayer, but it was during her address where she appeared to look uncomfortable. 
As she was talking to the crowds, her husband Donald came up behind her and touched her on the arm. 
Looking to the side, Melania appeared to shudder as she felt the US President's hand on her skin. Donald touches Melania on the arm as she speaks (Photo: Sky News) Melania is all smiles as she stands by her husband (Photo: Getty Images North America) 
Social media users were quick to point out that the First Lady looked ill at ease. 
One twitter user called Colette said: “Seemed very nervous” while another said: “ Melania Trump is nervous just giving speech.” 
And it's not the first time she has been caught looking unhappy in the presence of her husband. 
On January 20, at Trump's inauguration, Melania had a beaming smile on her face as she talked with her husband. Read More The First Lady appears to shudder as her husband makes skin contact (Photo: Sky News) The First Lady has been seen looking miserable before (Photo: Sky News) 
But as soon as his back was turned, her expression immediately fell. 
Viewers, noticing the drastic change in her facial expressions, immediately recorded the clip and started posting it on social media, where it's been shared hundreds of thousands of times. Read More (Photo: Youtube) (Photo: Youtube) 
And there's now even a Free Melania hastag on Twitter as concerned social media users have asked the First Lady to 'blink twice if she needs help'. 
Melania has been living in New York while the couple's son Barron finishes school, meaning she has been absent from some of Trump's public appearances. 
Trump's daughter Ivanka has often taken her place in the last month. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
